result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Shana Lee Smith

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Shana Lee Smith in court with attorney Jillian Jean Scheidegger.  Defendant Shana Lee Smith in custody.  Antoinette L. Rich appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter:  Darlene Shue
St- A global offer was extended. Request a COP and sentencing date.
Def- Correct statement. Request the PSI be waived on the new files.
St- No objection.
BTC: PSI waived on new files. Set all files for pleas.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for December 21, 2015 at 09:30 am.

Defendant Shana Lee Smith in court with attorney Jennifer Marie Severino.  Matthew J. Hastings appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter:  Darlene Shue. 
St - Plea to Cts 2 & 3 in 15CF619, DRI Cts 1, 4 & 5, and 15CM248 and 15CM922. Stand silent on req for expungment
Rights given
P - No Contest
BTC: Finding of guilt Cts 2 & 3; DRI Cts 1, 4 & 5, and 15CM248 and 15CM922. PSI ordered. 
Def - Req bond modified to remove SCRAM
BTC: Motion for bond modification granted - SCRAM may be removed. Defendant must comply w/treatment program. 
  Sentencing hearing scheduled for December 4, 2015 at 10:00 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Shana Lee Smith
Current: 7018 Whitewater St, Racine, WI 53402 United States  (Effective: 06-29-2015)
Prior: 6825 Douglas Ave Apt 1, Racine, WI 53402

CO-SIGNER:  GRANDMOTHER - RHONDA SMITH.  Charges per attached criminal complaint. Conditions:  Must live with grandmother and follow grandmother's house rules.  It is a condition of this bond that the defendant NOT consume or possess any  alcohol.  This is to be monitored by random UA's and/or breathalyzers.  The defendant is to report to Zimmerman Consulting Inc. (ZCI) for monitoring - report to 524 Main Street, Suite 302, Racine, WI  53403 (third floor of the Monument Square Building) or call (262)632-1780 to immediately schedule an appointment.  The defendant is further ordered to report for testing after each court appearance.  Defendant is ordered to have SCRAM unit installed and monitored by Zimmerman Consulting Inc. (ZCI) - 524 S. Main Street, 3rd floor (262-632-1780.  $208 advanced fee for installment of SCRAM must be paid prior to release from jail.  No violent contact with the victim, CS (person, property, residence or family).   Make all court appearances on time.  Failure to appear will result in the issuance of a warrant for your arrest, possible bail jumping charges and forfeiture of any bond on deposit.
Status conference on August 18, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Shana Lee Smith in court with attorney Jennifer Marie Severino.  Defendant Shana Lee Smith in custody.  Robin K. Green appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter:  Katie Giebel.  Req bond mod.  Victim present.  May be consolidated w felony.    Req to lift no cont & co-sig bond w grandmother Rhonda Smith.
BTC:  Mod bond to co-sig w Rhonda Smith; Live w grandmother.  No violent cont w mother.  Obey rules of grandmother.  Status conference scheduled for August 18, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Bail/bond hearing on June 29, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Shana Lee Smith in court with attorney Jennifer Marie Severino.  Defendant Shana Lee Smith in custody.  Robin K. Green appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Elizabeth Kiel.  Pending felony.  Referred to Drug Ct.  Status conference scheduled for July 13, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Shana Lee Smith in court with attorney Jennifer Marie Severino.  Defendant Shana Lee Smith in custody.  Robin K. Green appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Elizabeth Kiel.  Status conference scheduled for June 16, 2015 at 08:30 am.
